snippet: Acknowledging “systemic management problems” at the mental health unit, the Correction Department also disciplined a correction officer and the supervisor of mechanics.
abstract: New York City's Correction Dept announces that it is demoting Rose Agro, warden in charge of the mental health unit at Rikers Island and punishing other employees, after outcry over death of mentally ill inmate Jerome Murdough in February; Murdough died after being left unattended for hours as the temperature in his cell climbed above 100 degrees.
lead_paragraph: Acknowledging “systemic management problems” at the mental health unit, the Correction Department also disciplined a correction officer and the supervisor of mechanics.

headline.main: Warden at Rikers Island Demoted After Inmate Dies in Overheated Cell
headline.print_headline: Warden at Rikers Island Demoted After Inmate Dies in Overheated Cell
